name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior ML Engineer with 8 years of experience in Machine Learning, AI, and MLOps, specializing in the deployment of robust machine learning models and real-time systems. Proficient in **Python**, with a strong focus on model deployment and production monitoring, ensuring seamless integration of ML solutions. Experienced in using cloud platforms like **AWS** and **Azure** for scalable infrastructure. I excel in delivering high-quality, compliant applications, following best practices in code quality and testing.

Skilled in developing and orchestrating ML pipelines using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** to streamline the deployment of machine learning workflows. Adept in collaborative environments, I lead efforts in batch processing and real-time data processing, enhancing organizational capabilities in data science. My background in full-stack development utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** further supports my ability to bridge the gap between ML model development and application deployment, ensuring end-to-end solution integrity.

Implemented enterprise-level pipelines for continuous integration and deployment using **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, and **CircleCI**, ensuring rigorous **Testing** protocols with tools including **Jest**, **Cypress**, **PyTest**, and **Postman** to cover unit, integration, E2E, and contract testing across front-end and backend services.

Designed and maintained cloud-native data architectures with **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **GraphQL**, optimizing for large-scale healthcare and financial data ingestion, storage, and querying, demonstrating solid knowledge in **Cloud** infrastructures.

Established production monitoring using automation and error analytics tools such as **Firebase Crashlytics** and **Sentry**, ensuring high system reliability and performance in real-time systems.

Developed scalable, full-stack platforms using **TypeScript**, **Python** (FastAPI), and **Node.js**, ensuring compliance with industry standards like HIPAA, FHIR, GDPR, and PCI DSS for 9+ applications across healthcare and financial sectors.

Integrated advanced search capabilities using **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch** across millions of health records and financial documents, enhancing data accessibility and retrieval.

Developed and orchestrated real-time ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference directly into backend services for immediate decision-making.
Designed and maintained **Real-time Systems** involving transaction monitoring dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, allowing operations teams to track financial activities and generate actionable insights.
Engineered efficient ETL pipelines through **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from both internal and third-party sources, ensuring timely data availability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to adopt **MLOps** practices that enhanced **Code Quality**, **Testing**, and **Production Monitoring** across various projects, increasing delivery efficiency by **20%**.
Spearheaded the development and modernization of financial platforms leveraging a microservices architecture with **Node.js** (**NestJS/Express**) and **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**), improving scalability and throughput for high-volume transaction systems by over **30%**.
Built dynamic front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create responsive and user-centric interfaces for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Integrated messaging systems such as **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to facilitate an event-driven architecture that supports asynchronous communication for transactions and alert systems.

Utilized **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **cloud** technologies to develop and deploy machine learning models for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring effective **model deployment** and operational excellence.
Engineered scalable **real-time systems** using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling instant updates and a responsive user experience.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate AI-driven features, optimizing the use of machine learning techniques for **batch processing** and real-time data analysis, leveraging tools like **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**.
Implemented rigorous **code quality** measures and conducted comprehensive testing to maintain high standards in the deployment of models, ensuring their performance and reliability in production.
Applied cloud solutions to enhance the capabilities of **MLOps** and **LLMOps**, promoting efficient model training, monitoring, and versioning across multiple deployments.
- Designed a robust monitoring system for model performance and user interactions, achieving a **20% improvement** in response times and ensuring high availability during peak traffic periods.
- Collaborated using Agile methodologies, participating in **collaboration** sessions that resulted in a **30% increase** in team efficiency for feature development.
- Executed precise quality assurance protocols leading to a **15% reduction** in post-deployment issues, fostering continuous delivery practices.
Maintained security by implementing **OAuth 2.0** and ensuring compliance with GDPR standards for data protection, supporting secure access across user roles.
Established best practices for production monitoring, applying metrics and alerts to maintain system health and promptly address any anomalies.
